sm.description: Top and bottom padding – for small size buttons.

md.description: Top and bottom padding  – for medium size buttons.

lg.description: Top and bottom padding  – for large size buttons.

sm.description: Left and right padding – for small size buttons.

md.description: Left and right padding  – for medium size buttons.

lg.description: Left and right padding – for large size buttons.

sm.description: Horizontal gap between icon and text label – for small size buttons.

md.description: Horizontal gap between icon and text label  – for medium size buttons.

lg.description: Horizontal gap between icon and text label – for large size buttons

sm.description: Forces the icon-only button to be round and the same height as a small with-text button.

md.description: Forces the icon-only button to be round and the same height as a medium with-text button.

lg.description: Forces the icon-only button to be round and the same height as a large with-text button.

sm.description: Forces the icon-only button to be a circle.

md.description: Forces the icon-only button to be a circle.

lg.description: Forces the icon-only button to be a circle.

sm.description: Not required in the code. Used only for simpler maintaining reasons in Figma.

md.description: Not required in the code. Used only for simpler maintaining reasons in Figma.

lg.description: Not required in the code. Used only for simpler maintaining reasons in Figma.

default.description: For entirely round standard buttons in Oblique.

border-width.description: Default border width for buttons (additional hover border not included)

enabled.description: No shadow needed on enabled state of button.

hover.description: A shadow needed for elevation effect on hover state of button.

focus.description: No shadow needed on focus state of button.

pressed.description: No shadow needed on pressed state of button.

disabled.description: No shadow needed on disabled state of button.
